text: Brian Baker and Ryan Harrison were the defending champions but chose not to defend their title. Peter Polansky and Neal Skupski won the title after defeating Luke Bambridge and Mitchell Krueger 4–6, 6–3, [10–1] in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ==References== * Main Draw Savannah Challenger - Doubles 2017 Doubles
title: 2017 Savannah Challenger – Doubles
